name: UTileSheetPaddingFactory
doc: Factory used to pad out each individual tile in a tile sheet texture

ExtrusionAmount: The amount to extrude out from each tile (in pixels)
bPadToPowerOf2: Should we pad the texture to the next power of 2?
bFillWithTransparentBlack: Should we use transparent black or white when filling the texture areas that aren't covered by tiles?
